name: DysonCare
0:
”Alexa, open Dyson Care”
”Alexa, ask Dyson Care to help clean my filter”
”Alexa, ask Dyson Care to introduce me to my new Dyson”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dyson care
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Dyson smart assistant is here to help care for your cordless vacuum. It can give you quick start guides to help you get started with a new cordless vacuum, on-the-spot advice for troubleshooting the most common issues, and monthly cleaning and maintenance reminders to keep up your machine’s performance. 

Did you just purchase a new Dyson cordless vacuum? Use the quick start guides to make sure it’s all set up. Learn about accessories, power modes, and display features, and get helpful tips on how to take care of your machine.

Choose troubleshooting to get help with the most common issues that occur when using a Dyson cordless vacuum – from power and suction issues to anything visible like marks and scratches on the machine. The assistant will guide you through a step-by-step process to recognize and fix these problems. 

Dyson Care can also play helpful videos around machine set up, troubleshooting, and vacuum maintenance - or send links to videos and instructions directly to your smartphone. If you're already registered on Dyson.com, you can get a link to check your warranty and order spare parts for your vacuum. Moreover, you can ask Dyson Care to set a monthly reminder to clean and maintain your machine to ensure its high performance and longevity. 

To get started, just say: "Alexa, open Dyson Care." 

Or go straight to your specific topic with these: 
"Alexa, ask Dyson Care to introduce me to my new Dyson." 
"Alexa, ask Dyson Care to help clean my filter." 
"Alexa, ask Dyson Care to help me fix a power issue." 
"Alexa, ask Dyson Care to help with a broken vacuum part."


The Dyson Care skill supports the following cordless vacuums: Dyson V6, Dyson V7, Dyson V8, Dyson V10, Dyson V11, Dyson Outsize, Dyson V12, Dyson Omni-glide, Dyson Micro, Dyson V15, Dyson Gen5detect, Dyson Gen5outsize, Dyson V15s Detect Submarine.
